blocks.name: clfig
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of finitely generated left modules.

blocks.name: df-lfig
blocks.content: Define the class of finitely generated left modules. Finite generation of subspaces can be intepreted using ` |``s ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)

} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wb(wcel(c0, clfig), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c0, clfig), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), cima(c2, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn))))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c0, clfig), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), cima(c2, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn))), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, clmod, wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(clspn, cv(hs0)), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cfn))))))

  elrab3(hs0, c0, clmod, wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cima(cfv(clspn, cv(hs0)), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cfn))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), cima(c2, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn))))

  imaeq12d(cfv(clspn, cv(hs0)), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cfn), c2, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, clspn)
  ineq1d(cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cfn, cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), cima(c2, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn))), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, clmod), wb(wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), cima(c2, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wfn(c2, cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wss(cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))))
  ffnd(c2, cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(clss, c0), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lspf(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(clss, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(clss, c0))
  inss1(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn)
  fvelimab(s0, c2, cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn), cfv(cbs, c0))
  rexbii2(s0, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn), cpw(c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1)))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cfn)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1)))

  eqeq2i(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c0), c1)

  anass(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(clmod)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), cima(c2, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn))))
  diff.cin.s(s0, cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cfv(cbs, c0))

thm islmodfg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ LMod →(c0 ∈ LFinGen ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧(c2 ` s0)= c1))))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(LSpan ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ LMod →(c0 ∈ LFinGen ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧(c2 ` s0)= c1)))), d(s0, c1))
  bitrd(c0 ∈ LMod, c0 ∈ LFinGen, ∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧(c2 ` s0)= c1)), (Base ` c0)∈(c2 "(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin)))
  syl5bb(c0 ∈ LMod, c0 ∈ LFinGen, (Base ` c0)∈(c2 "(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin)), c0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ LMod |(Base ` hs0)∈((LSpan ` hs0)"(P((Base ` hs0))⋂ Fin))})
  eleq2i(c0, clfig, { hs0 ∈ LMod |(Base ` hs0)∈((LSpan ` hs0)"(P((Base ` hs0))⋂ Fin))})
  df-lfig(hs0)
  elrab3(hs0, c0, clmod, (Base ` hs0)∈((LSpan ` hs0)"(P((Base ` hs0))⋂ Fin)), (Base ` c0)∈(c2 "(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin)))
  eleq12d((Base ` hs0), ((LSpan ` hs0)"(P((Base ` hs0))⋂ Fin)), (Base ` c0), (c2 "(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin)), hs0 = c0)
  imaeq12d((LSpan ` hs0), (P((Base ` hs0))⋂ Fin), c2, (P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin), hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((LSpan ` hs0), c2, (LSpan ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, clspn)
  ineq1d(P((Base ` hs0)), cfn, P((Base ` c0)), hs0 = c0)
  pweqd((Base ` hs0), (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  syl6bb(c0 ∈ LMod, (Base ` c0)∈(c2 "(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin)), ∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧(c2 ` s0)= c1)), ∃(s0 ∈(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin),(c2 ` s0)=(Base ` c0)))
  sylancl(c0 ∈ LMod, ((Base ` c0)∈(c2 "(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin))↔ ∃(s0 ∈(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin),(c2 ` s0)=(Base ` c0))), c2[Fn]P((Base ` c0)), (P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin)⊆ P((Base ` c0)))
  ffnd(c2, P((Base ` c0)), (LSubSp ` c0), c0 ∈ LMod)
  lspf(c0, c2, (Base ` c0), (LSubSp ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((LSubSp ` c0))
  inss1(P((Base ` c0)), cfn)
  fvelimab(s0, c2, P((Base ` c0)), (P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin), (Base ` c0))
  rexbii2(s0, (P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin), P(c1), (c2 ` s0)=(Base ` c0), (s0 ∈ Fin ∧(c2 ` s0)= c1))
  bitri((s0 ∈(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin)∧(c2 ` s0)=(Base ` c0)), (s0 ∈ P(c1)∧(s0 ∈ Fin ∧(c2 ` s0)= c1)), ((s0 ∈ P(c1)∧ s0 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 ` s0)= c1))
  anbi12i(s0 ∈(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin), (c2 ` s0)=(Base ` c0), (s0 ∈ P(c1)∧ s0 ∈ Fin), (c2 ` s0)= c1)
  bitri(s0 ∈(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin), (s0 ∈ P(c1)∧ s0 ∈ Fin), (s0 ∈ P((Base ` c0))∧ s0 ∈ Fin))
  elin(s0, P((Base ` c0)), cfn)
  anbi1i(s0 ∈ P((Base ` c0)), s0 ∈ Fin, s0 ∈ P(c1))
  eleq2i(s0, P((Base ` c0)), P(c1))
  pweqi((Base ` c0), c1)
  eqeq2i((c2 ` s0), (Base ` c0), c1)
  eqcomi((Base ` c0), c1)
  anass(s0 ∈ P(c1), s0 ∈ Fin, (c2 ` s0)= c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(clmod)
  diff.hs0.w((Base ` c0)∈(c2 "(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin)))
  diff.cin.s(s0, P((Base ` c0)), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, (Base ` c0))
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
}

thm islssfg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, clfig), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c1)))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clspn, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, clfig), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c1))))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  3bitr4rd(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clfig), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c1))), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c3)))), wrex(s0, cpw(cfv(cbs, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c3)))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c3)))), wrex(s0, cpw(cfv(cbs, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c3))))))
  rexeqdv(s0, cpw(c1), cpw(cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c3))))
  pweqd(c1, cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c1, c2))
  rexbidva(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c3))))
  anbi2d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c3)))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c1, cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1))))
  sylan2(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(s0))), wss(cv(s0), c1))
  elpwi(cv(s0), c1)
  3expa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(s0))))
  lsslsp(c0, c1, c2, cv(s0), c4, cfv(clspn, c3), c3)
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  syl(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  lssss(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  ressbas2(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), c3, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, clfig), wrex(s0, cpw(cfv(cbs, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, c3))))), wcel(c3, clmod))

thm islssfg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ∈ LFinGen ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧(c4 ` s0)= c1))))
  ⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(LSpan ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ∈ LFinGen ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧(c4 ` s0)= c1)))), d(s0, c4))
  3bitr4rd((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3 ∈ LFinGen, ∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧(c4 ` s0)= c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧((LSpan ` c3)` s0)=(Base ` c3))), ∃(s0 ∈ P((Base ` c3)),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧((LSpan ` c3)` s0)=(Base ` c3))))
  adantl(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, (∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧((LSpan ` c3)` s0)=(Base ` c3)))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ P((Base ` c3)),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧((LSpan ` c3)` s0)=(Base ` c3)))))
  rexeqdv(s0, P(c1), P((Base ` c3)), c1 ∈ c2, (s0 ∈ Fin ∧((LSpan ` c3)` s0)=(Base ` c3)))
  pweqd(c1, (Base ` c3), c1 ∈ c2)
  rexbidva(s0, P(c1), (c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (s0 ∈ Fin ∧(c4 ` s0)= c1), (s0 ∈ Fin ∧((LSpan ` c3)` s0)=(Base ` c3)))
  anbi2d(((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧ s0 ∈ P(c1)), s0 ∈ Fin, (c4 ` s0)= c1, ((LSpan ` c3)` s0)=(Base ` c3))
  eqeq12d((c4 ` s0), c1, ((LSpan ` c3)` s0), (Base ` c3), ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧ s0 ∈ P(c1)))
  sylan2((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2), s0 ∈ P(c1), (c4 ` s0)=((LSpan ` c3)` s0), s0 ⊆ c1)
  elpwi(s0, c1)
  3expa(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ c1, (c4 ` s0)=((LSpan ` c3)` s0))
  lsslsp(c0, c1, c2, s0, c4, (LSpan ` c3), c3)
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ P(c1), c1 =(Base ` c3))
  syl(c1 ∈ c2, c1 =(Base ` c3), c1 ⊆(Base ` c0))
  lssss(c1, c2, (Base ` c0), c0)
  ressbas2(c1, (Base ` c0), c3, c0)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  syl((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c3 ∈ LFinGen ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ P((Base ` c3)),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧((LSpan ` c3)` s0)=(Base ` c3)))), c3 ∈ LMod)
  lsslmod(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  islmodfg(s0, c3, (Base ` c3), (LSpan ` c3))
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  eqid((LSpan ` c3))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, (Base ` c3))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, clmod)
  diff.clmod.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c3)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, clspn, c3)
  diff.clspn.s(s0)
}

thm islssfg2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, clfig), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c4), cfn), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clspn, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clfig), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c4), cfn), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c1)), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c1))))
